entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 700 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
